Onịchạ bu ama ukwu no na Naigeria.
The famous Niger River and Niger Bridge defines Onitsha as the gateway to the Igbo heartland.
Dennis Memorial Grammar School established by the Anglican Church Mission Society in 1925.
The Ofala Festival held once a year is a celebration of Onitsha tradition and culture.
Federal expressway reconstructed by Governor Peter Obi of Anambra.
Main Market one of the largest markets in West Africa.
